item.title: 悲观主义者称通胀将卷土重来
item.description:
关税将带来灾难，这一点毋庸置疑；唯一的问题是何时发生。【原文：

Tariffs will bring it with an unblinking certitude; the only question is when.

】

item.title: 比亚迪港股较岸股溢价创新高
item.description: 比亚迪股份有限公司的股价在香港创下历史新高，与在内地交易的股票相比，溢价率达到历史最高水平。【原文：BYD Co.’s shares rose to a record high in Hong Kong, expanding their premium over those trading on the mainland to the highest level ever.】

item.title: 南非仲裁员建议增加薪酬以避免物流罢工
item.description: 一位第三方仲裁人向南非国有港口和铁路公司及其工会提出了更高的工资提议，以避免数千名物流工人可能举行的罢工。【原文：A third-party arbiter proposed a higher wage offer to South Africa’s state-owned ports and rail company and its unions in a bid to stave off a potential strike by thousands of logistics workers.】

item.title: 中国当局在走私调查中讯问金属企业老板
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，中国政府已对国内一些主要金属商和生产商的负责人进行了质询，以加大打击重要矿产品走私的力度。【原文：Chinese authorities have questioned the heads of some of the country’s leading metals merchants and producers as part of an intensifying effort to crack down on critical-minerals smuggling, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官敦促美国降低进入 500 亿美元中国市场的门槛
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）首席执行官黄仁勋呼吁美国放宽对中国出口人工智能技术的限制，否则就有可能将数十亿美元的收入拱手让给华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Nvidia Corp. chief Jensen Huang called on the US to ease restrictions on the export of AI technology to China, or risk losing out on billions of dollars in revenue to up-and-coming rivals such as Huawei Technologies Co.】

item.title: 绿树之后，CATL 香港上市募集资金增至 52 亿美元
item.description: 当代安派科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.在交易安排人行使所谓的 "绿鞋"（greenshoe）选择权增发股票后，安培瑞斯科技有限公司的香港股票销售募集到了 410 亿港元（52 亿美元）的资金，从而使这一今年全球最大的上市项目规模更大。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. has raised HK$41 billion ($5.2 billion) for its Hong Kong share sale after arrangers of the deal exercised the so-called greenshoe option to increase the offering, making the world’s biggest listing this year even bigger.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利策略师称 "买美国，不买美元
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）上调了对美国股市和国债的看涨预期，因为市场预期美联储未来的一系列降息措施将支持债券并提振公司盈利。【原文：Morgan Stanley has raised its call on US stocks and Treasuries on expectations that a slew of future interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve will support bonds and boost company earnings.】

item.title: 印度股票资本市场在关税不确定性中恢复活跃
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国以法律行动威胁美国华为禁令的执行者
item.description: 中国表示，它可能会对任何执行美国对使用华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：China said it could take legal action against anyone enforcing US restrictions on using Huawei Technologies Co.’s AI chips, escalating a dispute that’s upset a tentative truce on tariffs.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金减持华丽七号，买入中国股票
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Hedge funds cut their holdings of the so-called Magnificent Seven technology stocks while increasing exposure to Chinese companies listed in the US during the first quarter, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 中美贸易飙升，出口商竞相抢占贸易休战窗口
item.description: 全球最大的两个经济体之间的临时贸易休战引发了中国港口和工厂的反弹。【原文：A temporary trade truce between the world’s two largest economies has sparked a knee-jerk bounce across China’s ports and factory floors.】

item.title: 高盛警告：如果价格进一步下跌，欧洲天然气补给将面临风险
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Europe can secure enough liquefied natural gas to refill storage for next winter at current prices, but the region faces competition for supply should prices fall further, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 七国集团讨论对中国低价值产品征收关税问题
item.description: 加拿大财政部长弗朗索瓦-菲利普-香槟（Francois-Philippe Champagne）表示，七国集团已开始讨论对供过于求的低价值中国产品征收关税的问题。【原文：Canadian Finance Minister Francois-Philippe Champagne said Group of Seven countries have started discussing tariffs on oversupplied, low-value Chinese products.】

item.title: 中国人工智能反弹落后者百度面临盈利提升的低门槛
item.description: 当前的财报季对中国大型科技股来说基本上是一个低谷，这降低了百度公司在人工智能主题上给寻求新角度的投资者留下深刻印象的难度。【原文：The current earnings season has largely been a letdown for China’s big tech stocks, lowering the hurdle for Baidu Inc. to impress investors seeking a fresh angle on the artificial intelligence theme.】

item.title: 美联储戴利和哈马克强调观望政策方针
item.description: 两位美联储官员强调，在经济面临高度不确定性的情况下，美国央行可以保持耐心，在调整政策前对新收到的数据进行评估。【原文：Two Federal Reserve officials underscored the US central bank can be patient and assess incoming data before adjusting policy as the economy navigates heightened uncertainty.】

item.title: 韩国五月初出口下降，运往美国的货物锐减
item.description: 韩国的早期贸易数据显示，本月出口再次下降，尤其是对美国的出口，因为首尔和华盛顿之间关于对来自亚洲国家的货物征收关税的谈判仍在继续。【原文：South Korea’s early trade data showed exports falling again this month especially to the US as negotiations between Seoul and Washington continue over tariffs on shipments from the Asian nation.】

item.title: 日本债券 "买家罢工 "向日本央行发出缩表警告信号
item.description: 日本的主权债务市场正在向央行发出警告，收回债券购买计划需要慎之又慎。【原文：Japan’s sovereign debt market is flashing a warning to the central bank that dialing back its bond purchases needs to be done with great care.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税，日本 4 月出口增长放缓
item.description: 随着美国加大关税措施的力度，日本出口增长放缓，这给贸易战爆发前刚刚出现萎缩的经济前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Growth in Japan’s exports slowed as the US ramped up its tariff measures, clouding the outlook for an economy that contracted just ahead of the trade war.】

item.title: 日本农相江藤因大米问题辞职
item.description: 日本农相周三辞职，因为他在上周末表示自己从未购买过大米，在政府因食品价格上涨而备受指责之际，他的辞职招致了批评。【原文：Japan’s Farm Minister resigned Wednesday after saying over the weekend that he’s never bought rice, drawing criticism at a time when the government is facing heat for rising food prices.】

item.title: 新堡垒能源公司被取消波多黎各电力拍卖资格
item.description: 新堡垒能源公司（New Fortress Energy）在波多黎各政府为确保临时发电而举行的拍卖中被取消资格，这是亿万富翁韦斯-伊登斯（Wes Edens）陷入困境的公司遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：New Fortress Energy has been disqualified from an auction held by the Puerto Rican government to secure temporary power generation, the latest setback for billionaire Wes Edens’ troubled company.】

item.title: 里夫斯将与贝森特会面，英美协议仍存疑问
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）本周将与美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）举行会谈，两国将继续敲定削减唐纳德-特朗普总统政府所征关税协议的细节。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will hold talks with US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent this week, as the two countries continue to finalize the details of an agreement to cut tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 华硕首席执行官称，人工智能个人电脑距离实现承诺还有一两年时间
item.description: 华硕电脑公司联席首席执行官Samson Hu表示，新一批人工智能个人电脑要到2026年或更晚才能推动市场发展。【原文：The new crop of artificial intelligence-powered PCs will take until 2026 or later to drive the market forward, according to Asustek Computer Inc. co-Chief Executive Officer Samson Hu.】

item.title: 卡尔希在兜售交易数小时后撤回与 xAI 合作的声明
item.description: Kalshi Inc.撤回了与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能公司xAI合作的公告，而就在几个小时前，这家预测市场公司的一位高层管理人员还在吹捧这项交易。【原文：Kalshi Inc. withdrew announcements about a collaboration with Elon Musk’s artificial-intelligence firm xAI just hours after a top executive at the prediction markets firm touted the deal.】

item.title: 美国将对中国电池材料征收关税
item.description: 美国商务部得出结论，对从中国进口的关键电池组件征收反补贴税是不公平的。【原文：The US Commerce Department set the stage for anti-subsidy duties on imports of key battery components from China, after concluding materials had been unfairly subsidized.】

item.title: 丰田工业投资者泽纳尔希望获得少数股权保障
item.description: 丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp.董事长丰田章男接管这家日本汽车零部件制造商的计划引发了治理问题，可能会损害小股东的利益。【原文：Toyota Industries Corp. investor Zennor Asset Management LLP said a plan by Toyota Motor Corp. Chairman Akio Toyoda to take over the Japanese auto parts maker raises governance issues and may undermine minority shareholders’ interests.】

item.title: 堡垒之夜》历经四年征战重返苹果应用商店
item.description: 史诗游戏公司（Epic Games Inc.【原文：Epic Games Inc.’s hit game Fortnite has returned to Apple Inc.’s App Store in the US after more than four years, following a fierce legal battle between the two companies.】

item.title: 以色列准备打击伊朗的报道引发石油价格大涨
item.description: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）报道称，美国情报显示，以色列正在为可能打击伊朗核设施做准备，石油随之大涨。【原文：Oil jumped after CNN reported that US intelligence suggests Israel is making preparations to possibly strike Iranian nuclear facilities.】

item.title: 特朗普为出售美属萨摩亚近海采矿权搭建舞台
item.description: 随着对电动汽车电池、智能手机和其他技术中使用的关键材料的需求激增，特朗普政府正在为出售美属萨摩亚沿海的采矿权创造条件。【原文：The Trump administration is setting the stage to sell mining rights off the coast of American Samoa as demand surges for critical materials used in electric vehicle batteries, smart phones and other technology.】

item.title: 美国股市涨势暂缓，石油价格飙升，亚洲股市将攀升：市场综述
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市将继续走高，摆脱华尔街六天反弹后的停顿，交易商正在寻找新的催化剂。有报道称以色列正计划对伊朗实施打击，石油价格因此大涨。【原文：Stocks in Asia were set to edge higher on Wednesday, shrugging off a pause on Wall Street after a six-day rally, as traders looked for fresh catalysts. Oil jumped on a report that Israel is planning strikes on Iran.】

item.title: Wolfspeed 看跌期权在破产计划报告发布前大涨
item.description: 周二，交易员们加大了对 Wolfspeed 公司的看跌押注，此前《华尔街日报》在正常交易时间结束后报道称，这家陷入困境的芯片元件制造商正准备在几周内申请破产保护。【原文：Traders ramped up bearish bets Tuesday on Wolfspeed Inc., before the Wall Street Journal reported after regular market hours that the ailing chip component maker is preparing to file for bankruptcy protection within weeks.】
